pageContent: Context: The optimal management strategy for men with newly diagnosed clinically localized prostate cancer remains a matter of debate. Numerous series have reported cancer control and quality-of-life (QoL) outcomes following treatment with radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
Treatment outcomes and quality-of-life issues for patients treated with prostate brachytherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12629934/
